item.title: IntelliJ IDEA 기본 설정
item.description: IntelliJ IDEA 16.3 기본 설정 Memory Heap Size 수정 C:\Program Files (x86)\JetBrains\IntelliJ IDEA 2016.3.5\bin\idea.exe.vmoptions 파일을 열어 general memory policy를 수정한다. -Xms256m -Xmx750m Please note that very big Xmx and Xms values are not so good. In this case, GarbageCollector has to work with a big part of memory at a time and causes considerable hang-ups. On the other hand, too small values can lead to the OutOfMemory exception. The specified values provide enough memory and at the same time the GarbageCollector works often but rather fast.
